title: COVID-19 Policy Posted
content:
JAFAX takes our COVID-19 policies seriously. Our priority is and always will be the health and safety of everyone who attends our event, as well as our staff and volunteers.

With that in mind, JAFAX is requiring and enforcing masks within all indoor convention areas for all attendees, regardless of vaccination status.

We strongly encourage social distancing at all times while in the convention areas, including in lines for guests. Hand sanitizer will be available throughout the venue and we encourage frequent hand washing and sanitizing.

To see the full details of our COVID-19 policy, please browse our policy, here.
